MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra met Bryce at - such was Bryce's claim - the Petrified Temple|lair of the Writhing Dread. Bryce asked Kassandra to aid her in saving her Ligeia|lover.'

General_Description: '''A Slithery Plea''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met [[Bryce]] at the entrance to the [[Petrified Temple|lair]] of the [[Writhing Dread]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra returned to Bryce at the entrance to the [[Petrified Temple]] to ask or revisit questions about where to go.

([[Hard to Artemis]] not yet complete)
*'''Bryce:''' ''Did Ligeia's people have the key?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I haven't found it yet, but I will.''
*'''Bryce:''' ''Please hurry, there hasn't been—I can't hear anything inside the lair. It's gone quiet.''

(If players asked "Where exactly is the key?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You said Ligeia knew how to get into the lair—where exactly is the key?''
*'''Bryce:''' ''The Daughters of Artemis hide their most prized possessions in a cave in their village. It's protected by wild beasts and fierce warriors. The key is shaped like a disk. If they have it, it'll be there.''
(If players asked "Where can I find this mercenary?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This mercenary, the "Slayer of the Writhing Dread," where can I find him?''
*'''Bryce:''' ''He waits in a temple atop the hill in [[Ancient Pearl]]. Champions from all over seek to challenge him to build their reputations, but there's no way he killed the Creature. If he did, how was Ligeia taken?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Did you see the Creature yourself?''
*'''Bryce:''' ''No, but only the Writhing Dread would be strong enough to take Ligeia! She's too fierce. ...And too stubborn.''
(Leave – "I'll be on my way.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back.''
*'''Bryce:''' ''With answers, not questions, I hope.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra investigated the [[Huntress Village]] on [[Chios]] and the [[Mountain Temple of Poseidon]], in connection with her seeking a way to open the entrance to the Petrified Temple.
